alert.note: Alert for Coastal Nassau; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 14 at 2:35PM EST until January 15 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...In Florida, Inland St. Johns, Inland Flagler, Coastal Nassau, Trout River and South Central Duval Counties. In Georgia, Coastal Glynn and Coastal Camden Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Nassau; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River
